rule: The chatbot's output can contain multiple classifications not limited to the predefined categories.
input: Match-fixing scandal threatens the integrity of sports
complianceText:
The chatbot output is: "This matches the category: Sports". The description states that the chatbot should classify a news article into one of the specified categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech. The output provides a category, which is "Sports", and this category is one of the valid options specified in the description. There is no indication of any other violation based on the description provided, as it explicitly states the category which the article has been classified into, and does not require checking the input.

No violation.
OK
